name: Lost: The Game
description:
Find the exit to the maze without getting caught or going insane!

You were walking through your university one night and ended up falling to the ground. As you stood up you noticed red walls and weird sounds around; you were no longer in that familiar hallway.

You start to walk around with a creeping anxiety, as you just know you have to find the exit. You encounter weird blue and purple lights as you roam, and they relieve you of your anxious feelings.

Could a door be nearby?

Play to find out!
